tool_description:
バイクの最適な移動経路を算出することができます。排気量を設定することにより、その車両が通れる最適なルートを検索します。
Calculate the optimal route for motorcycles. By setting the displacement of the motorcycle, you can search for the route that can be taken.
name: NAVITIME Route(motorcycle)
title: NAVITIME Route(motorcycle)

api_list.name: route_motorcycle
api_list.description: Calculate the optimal route for motorcycles.

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description:
Output order.
(total_distance: total movement distance, time: required time)

Valid only for one-to-many search, or many-to-one route search.

optional_parameters.name: via
optional_parameters.description:
Destination.
(maximum number of 10 points)

optional_parameters.name: condition
optional_parameters.description:
Route search conditions.(recommend: recommended (default), 
toll_time: toll road use and time priority, 
toll_distance: toll road use and distance priority, 
toll_gas: toll road use and gasoline saving priority, 
free_time: free road use and time priority, 
free_distance: free road use and  distance priority, 
free_gas: free road use, gasoline saving priority)

optional_parameters.name: start_time
optional_parameters.description:
Departure time.
(ex.2021-01-15T08:00:00)

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data.
(degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: smart_ic
optional_parameters.description:
Smart IC consideration.
(unuse : not considering smart IC, use : considering smart IC)

optional_parameters.name: ferry
optional_parameters.description:
Ferry priority search.
(unuse : do not use ferries, use : use ferries, more_use : use ferries first)

optional_parameters.name: options
optional_parameters.description:
Additional output information.
(turn_by_turn: turn-by-turn information)

Point information for guiding progress information at such as intersections.

optional_parameters.name: fuel
optional_parameters.description:
Traveling distance per liter.
(Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 200)

optional_parameters.name: displacement
optional_parameters.description:
Displacement of the motorcycle.
(Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 3000)

If the displacement is less than 125cc, you cannot specify an ic in the point JSON.

optional_parameters.name: via_type
optional_parameters.description:
Routing mode.
(specified: specified order, optimal: optimal order)

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description:
Geodetic system of latitude and longitude.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

api_list.name: shape_motorcycle
api_list.description: Return informations of route shape to draw lines on a map.

optional_parameters.name: displacement
optional_parameters.description:
Displacement of the motorcycle.
(Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 3000)

If the displacement is less than 125cc, you cannot specify an ic in the point JSON.

optional_parameters.name: start_time
optional_parameters.description:
Departure time.
(ex.2021-01-15T08:00:00)

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data.
(degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: smart_ic
optional_parameters.description:
Smart IC consideration.
(unuse : not considering smart IC, use : considering smart IC)

optional_parameters.name: via
optional_parameters.description:
Destination.
(maximum number of 10 points)

optional_parameters.name: no
optional_parameters.description:
Route Number.
In the case of one-to-many or many-to-one search, it is necessary to specify one route to output from among multiple routes in the result.
If not specified, the first route will be selected.

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description:
Geodetic system of latitude and longitude.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: via_type
optional_parameters.description:
Routing mode.
(specified: specified order, optimal: optimal order)

optional_parameters.name: ferry
optional_parameters.description:
Ferry priority search.
(unuse : do not use ferries, use : use ferries, more_use : use ferries first)

optional_parameters.name: options
optional_parameters.description:
Additional output information.
(turn_by_turn: turn-by-turn information)

Point information for guiding progress information at such as intersections.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Output format (geojson: GeoJSON format (default), json: JSON format)

optional_parameters.name: condition
optional_parameters.description:
Route search conditions.(recommend: recommended (default), 
toll_time: toll road use and time priority, 
toll_distance: toll road use and distance priority, 
toll_gas: toll road use and gasoline saving priority, 
free_time: free road use and time priority, 
free_distance: free road use and  distance priority, 
free_gas: free road use, gasoline saving priority)

optional_parameters.name: fuel
optional_parameters.description:
Traveling distance per liter.
(Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 200)
